title: A Supreme Court Showdown in the #MeToo Era
description:
Brett Kavanaugh’s nomination to the U.S. Supreme Court was all but a sure thing and expected to change the courts and the country for decades to come. But a movement decades in the making is possibly upending Kavanuagh’s nomination. David Meyers speaks to Bloomberg News Supreme Court reporter Greg Stohr on if the GOP can still confirm him and the risks that might come with it. 
FOLLOW UP 
Greg latest: Feinstein Refers Mystery Kavanaugh Info to FBI, Sparking Confusion 
You can follow Greg at: @GregStohr
---- 
TicToc is a daily news podcast hosted by David Meyers (@davidfmeyers), produced at Bloomberg Worldwide HQ in New York City. You can follow up with us and watch our reporting @tictoc. If you like it, be sure to rate us on iTunes, and tell your friends!
